question: The work requirement of reciprocating pump with increase in acceleration head
The positive pump has less pressure at output than centrifugal pump. (Say True or False)
Slip of a reciprocating pump is defined as the

answers.a: Ratio of actual discharge to the theoretical discharge
answers.b: Sum of actual discharge and the theoretical discharge
answers.c: Difference of theoretical discharge and the actual discharge
answers.d: Product of theoretical discharge and the actual discharge

question: Saving of work done and power by fitting an air vessel to double acting reciprocating pump is of the order of
Reciprocating pump should be chosen in preference to centrifugal pump

answers.a: Large flows are to be pumped against small head
answers.b: Small flows are to be pumped against large head
answers.c: Liquids with suspended matters has to be pumped
answers.d: Hydraulic losses in pump and pipes are to be minimized
